text: From The Desk of the President - Monday, 18 May 2020 - https://t.co/KT0utsTfiu We often take our healthy and robust democracy for granted. Yet it is probably our greatest asset in our momentous struggle to overcome the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/lKA1SACSn6
